# Felinid
Felinids are a mutation of humans, sporting their signature ears and tail from your favourite japanese cartoons.
## Diet
Felinids share evolutionary roots with cats, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea!
## Claws
Felinids have razor sharp claws, so their unarmed attacks deal [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage.
## Keen Senses
Felinids take less damage from falling and impacts than other species thanks to their evolutionary roots!
## Padded Feet
Felinids can creep around silently when they're not wearing shoes.
## Drawbacks
Felinids take 15% more [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color], [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage. Felinids take 30% more Cold damage than other species. Felinids get thirsty 20% faster. Felinids have 25% less stamina than other species.
